other_title: Digimon Frontier - Revival of the Ancient Digimon
Digimon Frontier: Regeneration of Ancient Digimon
Digimon Movie 7: Island of the Lost Digimon
デジモンフロンティア 古代デジモン復活！！ (Japanese)
數碼寶貝 古代數碼寶貝復活 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: The five digi-destined children stumble upon an ancient island inhabited by two different types of digimon; The Beast types, and the Human types. When they see two young digimon-a beast and humanoid-have become friends, they decide something must be done about the feud.
